snippet: If the Olympic final on Thursday comes down to a shootout, the Americans plan to try a different strategy than the one they used in last year’s World Cup final.
abstract: United States women's soccer team is preparing for the Olympic gold medal match against Japan, just one year after losing to Japan in the 2011 World Cup final.
lead_paragraph: If the Olympic final on Thursday comes down to a shootout, the Americans plan to try a different strategy than the one they used in last year’s World Cup final.

headline.seo: U.S. Women Prepare for Rematch With Japan in Soccer Final
headline.main: If Rematch Means Shootout, U.S. Is Ready
headline.print_headline: If Rematch Means Shootout, U.S. Is Ready
